titles.title: A resolution commending the service of Dr. Lloyd J. Ogilvie, the Chaplain of the United States Senate.
A resolution commending the service of Dr. Lloyd J. Ogilvie, the Chaplain of the United States Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on March 13, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Honors Dr. Lloyd J. Ogilvie for his dedicated service as Chaplain of the United States Senate.
